intro: Wilbrandia glaziovii var. lobata, commonly known as the lobate wilbrandia, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the Malvaceae family and is characterized by its striking, showy flowers. The plant typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions, preferring well-drained soils and full sun exposure.
